text:
HERE.com | Berkeley, CA | Onsite | Full Time

The small team which writes all of the embedded software to capture reality around the world and all of the software to manage and monitor that process has an opening for a multi-talented software engineer. This role will primarily work on front-end applications with GUIs, but the team is small enough that everyone gets to work on more than one thing.

Go to https://here.taleo.net/careersection/01/jobsearch.ftl?lang=e... and search for Job Number 1500031586
